name: NSPanGestureRecognizer
desc: A continuous gesture recognizer for panning (dragging) gestures.

items.name: buttonMask
items.desc: A bit mask of the button (or buttons) required to recognize this gesture.

items.name: translation
items.desc: The distance traveled by the mouse during the gesture.

items.name: setTranslation
items.desc: Changes the current translation value of the gesture recognizer.

items.name: velocity
items.desc: The velocity of the pan, measured in points per second.

items.name: numberOfTouchesRequired
items.desc: The number of touches required in an NSTouchBar object for the gesture recognizer to match.
